issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

iPad (3.2.2) with mobile sdk build 1.4.2.dc7b90

1.Start in landscape
2.KS-iPad>Split View - Plain
3.Tap show modal and watch the window behind the modal as it draws

results: the split view changes orientation and is squashed

notes:only happens on first encounter, do it a second time and no repro.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: while modal is being invoked, split view briefly draws in the incorrect orientation/misplaced on iPad

comments.body: Cannot reproduce in SDK 2.2.0.014b86f with iPad Sim 5.1.
